name: Evocation of the Frail Beam of Debility

props.spellRulestext:
Evocation of the Frail Beam of Debility

You choose a target and a dark silvery beam strikes them, freezing and necrotizing their flesh. They receive a penalty to their Brawn and Finesse dice pools equal to Force+net successes. If this reduces either pool to 0, they fall to the ground debilitated until the spell ends.
